predicate.note: Frames file for 'process' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: boring but typical
example.text: Michael, which *trace* also processes potatoes, still relies on spuds for about a fourth of its sales and nearly half its pretax profit.

example.name: start and end states
example.text: John's word processor processed his dissertation from an orderly progression of arguments into "word salad".
